INSERT INTO t_intelligence_sub ( end_time, start_time, update_time, ioC , sub_category , alarm_name , threat_severity , counts , tag , alarm_status , event_time, asset_count) VALUES
(CAST(#{sub.endTime} AS timestamp),CAST(#{sub.startTime} AS timestamp),CAST(#{sub.updateTime} AS timestamp),#{sub.ioC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sub.subCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sub.alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sub.threatSeverity,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sub.counts,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{sub.tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sub.alarmStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},CAST(#{sub.eventTime} AS timestamp), (select count(1) from t_intelligence_sub_asset where event_time=DATE(CAST(#{sub.eventTime} AS timestamp)) and ioC=#{sub.ioC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE SET end_time = greatest(EXCLUDED.end_time, end_time), start_time = least(EXCLUDED.start_time, start_time), alarm_status = EXCLUDED.alarm_status , counts = counts + EXCLUDED.counts , update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, sub_category = CASE WHEN EXCLUDED.end_time >= end_time THEN EXCLUDED.sub_category ELSE sub_category END, alarm_name = CASE WHEN EXCLUDED.end_time >= end_time THEN EXCLUDED.alarm_name ELSE alarm_name END, threat_severity = coalesce(greatest(EXCLUDED.threat_severity, threat_severity),EXCLUDED.threat_severity,threat_severity), asset_count = EXCLUDED.asset_count, tag = CASE WHEN tag = '' or tag is null THEN EXCLUDED.tag ELSE tag END

INSERT INTO t_intelligence_sub_asset (ioC, asset_ip, event_time, start_time, end_time, alarm_status, counts , security_zone) VALUES
(#{item.ioC}, #{item.assetIp}, CAST(#{item.eventTime} AS timestamp), CAST(#{item.startTime} AS timestamp), CAST(#{item.endTime} AS timestamp), #{item.alarmStatus}, #{item.counts} ,#{item.securityZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE SET end_time = greatest(EXCLUDED.end_time, end_time), start_time = least(EXCLUDED.start_time, start_time), alarm_status = EXCLUDED.alarm_status , counts = counts + EXCLUDED.counts, security_zone = EXCLUDED.security_zone
